imageWatermarkRemoval.title: Image Watermark Removal
imageWatermarkRemoval.description: Upload an image, click on watermark locations, and remove watermarks with one click
imageWatermarkRemoval.imageCreditsInfo: Processing one image requires 1 credit. You have {credits} credits remaining.
imageWatermarkRemoval.promptTitle: Please click the image to mark watermark areas
imageWatermarkRemoval.promptDesc: Click on watermark regions in the image; the system will mark them automatically
imageWatermarkRemoval.promptHint: Tip: click any area to start testing
imageWatermarkRemoval.demoNote: Note: This is a demo version. Actual image processing requires complete Tencent Cloud API configuration.
imageWatermarkRemoval.uploadPrompt: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select a file

features.title: Features
features.intelligent: Intelligent Recognition: Automatically detect and remove watermarks and logos from images
features.precision: Precise Repair: Use AI technology to intelligently repair areas after watermark removal
features.batch: Batch Processing: Support simultaneous removal of multiple watermark areas
features.quality: HD Preservation: Maintain original image quality after processing

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.step1: Upload Image: Click to select image or drag image to upload area
instructions.step2: Mark Watermark: Use mouse to drag and select watermark area (yellow box for preview, red box for confirmed)
instructions.step3: Confirm Marking: Can add multiple watermark areas, or clear and re-mark
instructions.step4: Start Processing: Click the 'Remove Watermark' button and wait for AI processing
instructions.step5: Download Result: Download the repaired image after processing is complete

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Supports common formats like JPG, PNG, JPEG, up to 10MB in size.
faq.q2: How good is the watermark removal effect?
faq.a2: Uses Tencent Cloud AI technology for intelligent recognition and repair of watermark areas, with natural results while maintaining image quality.
faq.q3: How many watermarks can be removed at once?
faq.a3: Supports marking and removing multiple watermark areas simultaneously, with no quantity limit.
faq.a4: Usually completes within 10-30 seconds, depending on image size and watermark complexity.
faq.q5: What if I don't have enough credits?
faq.a5: You can purchase credit packages, or use the free trial quota (one free opportunity for each new user).

examples.title: Processing Examples
examples.subtitle: See how our AI technology precisely removes watermarks and logos

subscription.title: Subscription Plans
subscription.subtitle: Choose the plan that works for you
subscription.description: Get credits to convert videos to subtitles. 1 credit = 1 minute of video.

freeTrial.title: Free Trial
freeTrial.description: New users get 1 free conversion (max 30 seconds) after login

pricingRules.title: Credit Pricing Rules
pricingRules.subtitle: Subtitle removal service is billed by video resolution and duration
pricingRules.note: Partial minutes are rounded up to 1 minute

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Credits are the billing unit for our service. 1 credit can process 1 minute of video (watermark/logo removal). Subtitle removal is billed at different rates based on video resolution.
faq.q2: Do I need to register to use the service to remove watermarks?
faq.a2: Yes, you need to register and log in to use our service. New users get 1 free trial (max 30 seconds) after registration.
faq.a3: We offer 1 free trial (max 30 seconds) for new users. After that, you need to purchase credits or subscribe to a plan to continue using the service.
faq.q4: Should I choose pay-as-you-go credits or a subscription plan?
faq.a4: If you use the service occasionally, pay-as-you-go credits may suit you. If you use it frequently, subscription plans are more cost-effective with monthly auto-renewal and can be cancelled anytime.
faq.q5: What if I'm not satisfied with the result?
faq.a5: If you're not satisfied with the processing result, please contact our customer service team and we'll do our best to resolve your issue.
faq.q6: What if I run out of credit limit?
faq.a6: When your credits are exhausted, you can purchase additional credit packs or upgrade to a higher-tier subscription plan to continue using the service.
faq.q7: What is the cost for additional usage beyond my monthly credits?
faq.a7: Usage beyond monthly credits will be billed at standard credit prices. Please check our pricing page for specific rates.
faq.q8: Is registration required before using the service?
faq.a8: Yes, registration is required. After registration, you can enjoy the free trial and manage your conversion records and credits.
faq.q9: How many conversions can I perform with the service?
faq.a9: The number of conversions depends on the credits you have. Each video conversion consumes credits based on video length and processing type.
faq.a10: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, and more. All payments are processed through secure payment gateways.
faq.q11: Do you accept custom requests or specific needs?
faq.a11: We primarily provide standardized video watermark, logo, and subtitle removal services. For special requirements, please contact our customer service team.
faq.q12: What if I want to perform a specific image conversion?
faq.a12: Our service focuses on video processing. If you need image processing services, please check our other products.
faq.q13: What happens if I don't use up the full amount of monthly credits?
faq.a13: Unused monthly credits do not roll over to the next month. We recommend choosing a subscription plan that matches your actual usage.
faq.a14: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time. After cancellation, you can still use purchased credits, but auto-renewal will stop.

subscription.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

upload.title: Upload Your Video
upload.subtitle: Subtitle
upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your video here, or click to browse
upload.waiting: Processing takes some time, please wait patiently. The file will be automatically downloaded when processing is complete.
upload.tip: After uploading, you can view your conversion records in the Profile Center even if you leave this page
upload.freeLimit: Free usage is limited to videos up to 30 seconds. Subscribe or recharge to process longer videos.
upload.creditLimit: When using credits, videos must not exceed 2 minutes. Please trim and retry.

creditsInfo.title: Credit Deduction Rules
creditsInfo.rule: 1 minute of video deducts 1 credit, less than 1 minute is calculated as 1 minute

faq1.title: What video formats are supported?

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Professional Video Processing Service Provider
about.description: We are a professional video processing service provider dedicated to helping content creators, businesses, and individuals remove unwanted elements from their videos.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We are dedicated to providing high-quality video processing services that help content creators, businesses, and individuals remove unwanted elements from their videos. Our advanced AI-powered technology ensures precise and efficient watermark, logo, and subtitle removal.

items.ai: Advanced AI technology for accurate removal
items.secure: Secure and confidential handling of your videos

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.content: We utilize cutting-edge artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms to identify and remove watermarks, logos, and subtitles from videos. Our technology is continuously improved to provide the best results for our customers.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Our team consists of experienced video processing experts and AI engineers who are passionate about delivering the best possible service to our customers.

values.title: Our Values
values.qualityDesc: We prioritize quality in every aspect of our service
values.innovationDesc: We continuously innovate to improve our technology
values.customerDesc: Our customers' satisfaction is our top priority
values.integrityDesc: We operate with honesty and transparency

history.title: Our Story
history.content: Founded with a vision to make video editing accessible to everyone, we have been serving thousands of customers worldwide. Our commitment to excellence and innovation has made us a trusted name in video processing services.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our video watermark removal service.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including when you upload videos, create an account, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, payment information, and any videos you upload to our service. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and how you interact with our service, including IP address, browser type, and usage patterns.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process your video removal requests, communicate with you about your account and our services, send you technical notices and support messages, respond to your comments and questions, and ensure the security of our platform. We may also use your information for analytics purposes to understand how our service is used.

section3.title: 3. Data Security
section3.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information and videos. This includes encryption of data in transit and at rest, secure servers, and regular security audits. All uploaded videos are automatically deleted after 24 hours of processing completion. We do not store your videos permanently or share them with third parties.

section4.title: 4. Data Retention
section4.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. Video files are automatically deleted within 24 hours after processing. Account information is retained until you request deletion or close your account.

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Services
section5.content: We may use third-party services to help us operate our platform and provide services to you, such as payment processors, cloud storage providers, and analytics services. These third parties have access to your information only to perform specific tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. You can also request a copy of your data, withdraw your consent for data processing, object to certain types of processing, and request data portability. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

section7.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
section7.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.content: Our service is not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

section9.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
section9.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

section10.title: 10. Contact Us
section10.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
section10.address: Address: 深圳市龙华区龙华大道130栋

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using our video watermark removal service.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using our service, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this service.

section2.title: 2. Description of Service
section2.content: We provide video processing services to remove watermarks, logos, and subtitles from videos. Our service uses automated AI technology to process your uploaded videos. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the service at any time without prior notice.

section3.title: 3. User Account
section3.content: To use certain features of our service, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

section4.content: You are responsible for ensuring that you have the legal right to modify the videos you upload. You must not upload content that violates any laws, infringes on the rights of others, contains malware or viruses, or is otherwise harmful or illegal. You agree to use our service only for lawful purposes.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content: You retain all rights to your uploaded videos. By using our service, you grant us a limited, non-exclusive license to process your videos solely for the purpose of providing the service. All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of RemoveWatermark and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

section6.title: 6. Payment Terms
section6.content: Some features of our service may require payment. All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise stated. We reserve the right to change our pricing at any time. You are responsible for all applicable taxes.

section7.title: 7. Service Availability
section7.content: We do not guarantee that our service will be available at all times or that it will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. We may experience downtime due to maintenance, updates, or unforeseen circumstances.

section8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
section8.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of our service.

section9.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless RemoveWatermark and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses arising out of your use of our service or violation of these Terms.

section10.title: 10. Termination
section10.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to our service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including breach of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.intro: This Refund Policy outlines the terms and conditions for refunds on our video processing services.

section1.title: 1. Refund Eligibility
section1.content: We offer refunds for services that fail to meet our quality standards, if there is a technical error on our part that prevents the service from being delivered, or if the service is not provided within the promised timeframe. Refunds are considered on a case-by-case basis.

section2.title: 2. Refund Process
section2.content: To request a refund, please contact us within 7 days of your purchase or service completion. You must provide your order number and a detailed explanation of why you are requesting a refund. We will review your request and respond within 5 business days. If approved, refunds will be processed within 14 business days to your original payment method.

section3.title: 3. Non-Refundable Items
section3.content: Refunds are not available for services that have been successfully completed and delivered, if the issue is due to user error (such as uploading incorrect files or incompatible formats), if you change your mind after the service has been completed, or if the service was used for illegal purposes.

section4.title: 4. Partial Refunds
section4.content: In some cases, we may offer partial refunds if only a portion of the service was unsatisfactory. The amount of the partial refund will be determined based on the specific circumstances of your case.

section5.title: 5. Processing Time
section5.content: Refund requests are typically processed within 5-10 business days. Once approved, the refund will appear in your account within 14 business days, depending on your payment method and financial institution.

section6.title: 6. Chargebacks
section6.content: If you initiate a chargeback through your bank or credit card company, we reserve the right to dispute the chargeback and provide evidence of service delivery. We encourage you to contact us directly first to resolve any issues.

section7.title: 7. Contact for Refunds
section7.content: To request a refund, please contact us at:
section7.address: Address: 深圳市龙华区龙华大道130栋
section7.note: Please include your order number and reason for refund in your request.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: Please read this disclaimer carefully before using our video watermark removal service.

section1.title: 1. Service Disclaimer
section1.content: Our video processing service is provided 'as is' and 'as available' without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, error-free, or that defects will be corrected. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time without notice.

section2.title: 2. Results Disclaimer
section2.content: While we strive to provide the best results, the quality of watermark, logo, or subtitle removal may vary depending on various factors including video content, watermark characteristics, video quality, compression, and other technical factors beyond our control. We do not guarantee specific results or that all watermarks, logos, or subtitles will be completely removed.

section3.title: 3. Legal Disclaimer
section3.content: Users are solely responsible for ensuring they have the legal right to modify videos, including obtaining necessary permissions and licenses. We are not responsible for any legal consequences resulting from the use of our service, including copyright infringement, trademark violations, or other legal issues. Users must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

section4.title: 4. Content Disclaimer
section4.content: We do not review, monitor, or control the content of videos uploaded by users. We are not responsible for any content that violates laws or infringes on rights. Users are solely responsible for the content they upload and the use of processed videos.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, or business opportunities, arising from the use or inability to use our service, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

section6.title: 6. No Professional Advice
section6.content: The information and services provided on our platform are for general informational purposes only and do not constitute professional, legal, or technical advice. You should consult with appropriate professionals for advice specific to your situation.

section7.title: 7. Third-Party Links
section7.content: Our service may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. Your use of third-party websites is at your own risk.

section8.title: 8. Force Majeure
section8.content: We shall not be liable for any failure or delay in performance under these terms which is due to fire, flood, earthquake, elements of nature or acts of God, acts of war, terrorism, riots, civil disorders, rebellions or revolutions, or any other cause beyond our reasonable control.

section1.content: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of RemoveWatermark or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. The compilation of all content on this site is the exclusive property of RemoveWatermark.

section2.content: Users retain all copyright and intellectual property rights to videos and other content they upload to our service. We do not claim ownership of user-uploaded content. By uploading content, you represent and warrant that you own or have the necessary rights to the content and that it does not infringe on any third-party rights.

section3.content: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works from, publicly display, publicly perform, republish, download, store, or transmit any of the material on our website without our express written permission. section4.content: You may use our website content for personal, non-commercial purposes in accordance with fair use principles. However, any commercial use requires our express written consent.
